name: Spent Smart
description: Spent Smart allows users to input their monthly income and expense breakdown (along with their associated category options, such as paycheck, food, transportation, etc.).

name: BootStocks
description: A Fullstack Web Application that allowing users to create their mock stock portfolio.

name: To Make or To Go
description: A Web Application that utilizes Yelp Api and Google Maps Api that allowing users to search for recipes or a restaurant.

name: PWA Budget Tracker
description: A Full Stack Web Application that can be use either online or offline backed up with indexed DB so the users won't worry about their internet connections.

name: Google Books Search
description: A Web Application that allows users to search for their books and save it in a Database including a live notifications for saved books.

name: Note Taker
description: A Web App that can retrieve, add, update, delete user's notes.
